    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eln:demoportal</catalog>
            <entry>3905</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Batteries</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Batterien</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Batteries</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Baterias</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Batterie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μπαταρίες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Baterías</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Notice the luminous intensity with use of different batteries (1,5 v and 4,5 v).</string>
          </description>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beachten Sie die leuchtende Intensität mit 
Gebrauch der unterschiedlichen Batterien (1.5 v und 4.5 V).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Notez l'intensité lumineuse avec l'utilisation de
différentes batteries (1.5 v et 4.5 v).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Observe a intensidade luminous com uso de baterias
diferentes (1.5 v e 4.5 v).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Noti l'intensità luminosa con uso delle batterie 
differenti (1.5 v e 4.5 v).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρατηρήστε τη φωτεινή ένταση με τη χρήση των 
διαφορετικών μπαταριών (1.5 β και 4.5 v).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Note la intensidad luminosa con el uso de 
diversas baterías (1.5 v y 4.5 v).</string>
          </description>
        </general>
